CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, email TEXT, password TEXT, roleId INTEGER, createdAt DATETIME, updatedAt DATETIME)
INSERT: INSERT INTO users (email, password, roleId, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES ($email, $password, $roleId, $createdAt, $updatedAt)
UPDATE: UPDATE users SET email = $email, password = $password, roleId = $roleId, updatedAt = $updatedAt WHERE id = $id
